step1.title: Your Business
step1.subtitle: Tell us about your brand
step1.brandName: What is your brand / business name?
step1.productsPlaceholder: e.g. handmade personalized products like school bags, drawstring bags and mugs for children

step2.title: Your Target Audience
step2.subtitle: Who are your ideal customers?
step2.targetAudience: Who is your main target audience?
step2.targetAudiencePlaceholder: e.g. Mothers with children in elementary school
step2.region: Which region are they mainly in?
step2.problemSolved: What problem do you solve for them?
step2.problemSolvedPlaceholder: e.g. looking for unique, personalized gifts for their children's special occasions

step3.title: Brand Style & Tone
step3.subtitle: How should your brand feel?
step3.brandFeeling: Describe how your brand should feel
step3.brandFeelingPlaceholder: e.g. Like a dear friend who always has the best gift ideas - warm, creative and reliable

step4.title: Content Goals
step4.subtitle: What do you want to achieve with your content?

step5.title: Examples & Restrictions
step5.subtitle: Optional: Refine your style
step5.captionExamples: Examples of how your captions should sound
step5.captionExamplesPlaceholder: e.g. 'Today I'm showing you my new favorite project üíï Look, isn't this cute?'
step5.captionExamplesHelp: Give 1-3 example sentences that represent your style well
step5.avoidWordsPlaceholder: e.g. aggressive sales language, 'Buy now!', exaggerated superlatives

step6.title: Your System Prompt
step6.subtitle: Review and confirm your generated prompt
step6.editHint: You can still manually adjust the prompt here

usage.title: How your prompt will be used
usage.description: This system prompt will be automatically used for all AI generations - for captions, hashtags, images and videos. This keeps your content consistent with your brand.
